summary: This collection of documents primarily concerns Project KDAFGHAN, a photographic operation conducted in Mexico City. The documents cover various aspects, including equipment requests (specialized lenses, cameras), passport renewals for KDAFGHAN personnel, technical issues with pulse cameras and related equipment, file management procedures (opening, amending, closing files), cryptonym changes, and audit reports. Mentions of LIONION, AQUATIC, and other related operations are interwoven. Also included are administrative notices concerning file processing and retirement.
title: Various documents related to Project KDAFGHAN and related operations in Mexico City
